name: RTCRtpReceiver.getParameters
description: The getParameters() method of the RTCRtpReceiver interface returns an RTCRtpReceiveParameters object describing the current configuration for the encoding and transmission of media on the receiver's track.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
